article_title: Pope Francis joins other faith leaders to demand an end to human trafficking
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

VATICAN CITY (RNS) The leaders said it was a “human and moral imperative” to wipe out human trafficking, forced labor, prostitution and organ trafficking.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Culture, Ethics, declaration, human trafficking, Interfaith, Pope Francis, Rabbi Abraham Skorka, Rabbi David Rosen, slavery
